com.thunder.prefs

Class SharedPrefsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thunder.prefs.SharedPrefsManager

  • public class SharedPrefsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    a layer that allows a developer to call useful methods to deal with SharedPreferences

      • getValues

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getValues(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> defValues)
        Be aware that you can use only the following types for values: Integer, Long, String, Boolean, Float and Set
        Parameters:
        defValues - the default values for the keys, e.g. {key3=true, key2=2, key1=value1}
        Returns:
        the related values stored in the preferences

        Returns:

      • incrementSync

        public void incrementSync(java.lang.String key,
                 int defValue,
                 int step)
        Parameters:
        key -
        defValue - the default value if the key is not in the SharedPreferencesFile
        step - the value of the increment
